item.title: ACCOUNTING AUTOMATION
item.description: An Automation Solution was developed for an “Asset Management System” utilized by the energy industry. An asset management system was developed to track all the transactions associated with every asset purchased or sold by a perticular accounting unit.

item.title: INVENTORY AUTOMATION
item.description: The “Inventory Automation” solution was built for a jewelry e-commerce. issue: Client was selling verious products on multiple platforms. These includes their own website and other 3rd party online portals.
